content.json:
##### Change log 1.0 - Initial version.
1.1 - Layout change.

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
| where EventID == 4625
| make-series NumberOfFailedLogons = count() on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, 1h)
| extend (RSquare,Slope,Variance,RVariance,Interception,LineFit) = series_fit_line(NumberOfFailedLogons)
| project TimeGenerated, NumberOfFailedLogons, LineFit
content.title: Number of failed logons by hour (with trend line)

paramValidationRules.message: The number must be greater than 0

content.title: Total number of failed logons  - Top {NumberOfRecords} (select user to display details)

tooltipFormat.tooltip: Click on account name to display details.

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
| where Account =~ @"{AccountName}"
| summarize BadLogons = countif(EventID == 4625), SuccesfullLogons = countif(EventID == 4624) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)
| render timechart
content.title: Logons accross time for {AccountName}

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
| where Account =~ @"{AccountName}"
| where EventID == 4625
| summarize FailedLogons = count() by IpAddress
| order by FailedLogons
content.title: IP addresses list for {AccountName}

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
| where Account =~ @"{AccountName}"
| where EventID == 4625
| summarize FailedLogons = count() by IpAddress, bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
content.title: Bad logons per source IP for {AccountName}

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
| where Account =~ @"{AccountName}"
| where EventID == 4625
| extend Reason = case(  
    SubStatus == '0xc000005e', 'No logon servers available to service the logon request',  
    SubStatus == '0xc0000062', 'Account name is not properly formatted',  
    SubStatus == '0xc0000064', 'Account name does not exist',  
    SubStatus == '0xc000006a', 'Incorrect password',    
    SubStatus == '0xc000006d', 'Bad user name or password',  
    SubStatus == '0xc000006f', 'User logon blocked by account restriction',  
    SubStatus == '0xc000006f', 'User logon outside of restricted logon hours',  
    SubStatus == '0xc0000070', 'User logon blocked by workstation restriction',  
    SubStatus == '0xc0000071', 'Password has expired',  
    SubStatus == '0xc0000072', 'Account is disabled',  
    SubStatus == '0xc0000133', 'Clocks between DC and other computer too far out of sync',  
    SubStatus == '0xc000015b', 'The user has not been granted the requested logon right at this machine',  
    SubStatus == '0xc0000193', 'Account has expirated',  
    SubStatus == '0xc0000224', 'User is required to change password at next logon',  
    SubStatus == '0xc0000234', 'Account is currently locked out',  
    strcat('Unknown reason substatus: ', SubStatus))
| project TimeGenerated, Account, Reason, IpAddress, WorkstationName, LogonTypeName, AuthenticationPackageName
| order by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Event details for {AccountName}
